text: {{Infobox settlement | name = Neerijnen | settlement_type = Former municipality | image_skyline = Tuil (dorp).jpg | image_alt = | image_caption = Tuil | image_flag = Neerijnen vlag.svg | flag_size = 100x67px | flag_alt = | image_shield = Coat of arms of Neerijnen.svg | shield_size = 100x80px | shield_alt = | image_map = Map - NL - Municipality code 0304 (2009).svg | map_alt = Highlighted position of Neerijnen in a municipal map of Gelderland | map_caption = Location in Gelderland | coordinates = | coordinates_footnotes = | subdivision_type = Country | subdivision_name = | subdivision_type1 = Province | subdivision_name1 = | subdivision_type2 = Municipality | subdivision_name2 = West Betuwe | extinct_title = Merged | extinct_date = 1 January 2019 | unit_pref = Metric | area_footnotes = | area_total_km2 = | area_land_km2 = | area_water_km2 = | elevation_footnotes = | elevation_m = 3 | elevation_max_footnotes = | elevation_max_m = | elevation_min_footnotes = | elevation_min_m = | population_footnotes = | population_total = | population_as_of = | population_density_km2 = | population_demonym = | timezone = CET | utc_offset = +1 | timezone_DST = CEST | utc_offset_DST = +2 | postal_code_type = Postcode | postal_code = 4060–4061, 4063–4064, 4174–4185 | area_code_type = Area code | area_code = 0344, 0418 | website = | footnotes = }} Neerijnen is a former municipality in the Dutch province of Gelderland. Since 2019, it has been part of the new municipality of West Betuwe. == References == Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Settlements in Gelderland Category:Former municipalities of Gelderland Category:West Betuwe
